client
    socketService.js
        window.location.hostname = '127.0.0.1:5000';
    package.json
        "proxy": "http://127.0.0.1:5000"
        
server
    env
        process.env.DATABASE - mongodb://localhost:27017/social-network-test

bin/www
    port 5000


npx - package runner
nodemon - start node as below, but w auto-reload
node - run the node script specified
npm start - runs start script from package.json scripts object, or "node server.js" 
npm run - runs script from package.json scripts object
mocha - runs tests
concurrently - runs multiple commands
react-scripts - runs react shit
    start, build, test, eject

ctrl shift P :: command palette
F12 :: Go To Definition 
Alt+F12 :: Peek Definition 
Shift+F12 :: Show all references to a symbol.
Ctrl+Shift+O :: Go to Symbol in File 
Ctrl+T :: Go to symbol in workspace
F2 :: Rename
Ctrl + :: Refactor
ctrl shift X :: extensions

TO LOOK AT
CSS3
HTML5
js this, prototype
